TopicTitle: So we got hitchhiker IVA but...

Articles.Content: The MK2 and MK3 are still unfinished. They've been in since .15. There is a wonderful mod that adds IVA to the MK3, but the MK2 remains untouched. Do any of you guys use these? It seems like a waste in an otherwise amazing game.

Word on the street forum is that spaceplane parts are gonna receive an overhaul, that will probably come with an improved aerodynamics system.

That's why people don't want to spend their time working on these.
